description: This is a route definition file for an Express.js application managing 'Notes'. It sets up various endpoints for CRUD operations and listing notes, including Swagger documentation annotations for API specification.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Registers GET route at '/' with auth middleware to list notes

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Registers POST route at '/' with auth middleware to create a note

methods.name: router.get('/:id')
methods.description: Registers GET route to retrieve a specific note by ID

methods.name: router.put('/:id')
methods.description: Registers PUT route to update an existing note by ID

methods.name: router.delete('/:id')
methods.description: Registers DELETE route to delete a note by ID
